description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the spoofing vulnerability in Microsoft Edge for iOS (CVE-2024-30057):

1. Ensure you are using the latest version of Microsoft Edge for iOS by checking for updates in the App Store.
2. If updates are available, install them and restart the application to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- This patch addresses the spoofing issues that could allow attackers to spoof user activities in the application.
- For more information about this vulnerability, you can refer to the Microsoft Security Response Center (MSRC) at [Microsoft Edge CVE-2024-30057](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-30057).

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that your device has network connectivity to access the App Store.
- Backup any critical data before proceeding with the update to avoid unintentional loss.
